alert.note: Alert for Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 14 at 1:17PM MST until February 15 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST TUESDAY ABOVE 2500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 2500 feet. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches. * WHERE...Lower Hells Canyon/Salmon River Region, Whitebird Grade. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region
